column4: bastid_razor: no, I want just what comes with the server version
i'm asking if there's an easy way to make the the install like-new, or if I've got to figure out how to get a cdrom.
DaDa_, you could probably install a different bootloader, but as far as I know, you need to have one.
I have one already, so I only need to prevent it from installing anything over it
